com.googlecode.mockarro
Class Mockarro<T>

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.mockarro.Mockarro<T>

public class Mockarro<T>
extends Object

A utility class that provides basic Mockarro functionality.

marekdec

Method Detail

initSut

public static void initSut(Object systemUnderTest)
Initialises Mockarro for given system under test. Its basic task is to reset the test by creating and injecting mocks into the system under test.

This method has to be invoked before every single test execution - preferably within a before method (a method annotated with @Before in JUnit 4.x or @BeforeMethod in TestNG).

Parameters:
systemUnderTest - the unit that is going to be tested.

of

public Mockarro<T> of(Class<?> genericType,
                      Class<?>... moreGenericTypes)
Sets one or more generic parameters of the return type.

TODO: provide api for nested generics

Parameters:
genericType - first generic types
moreGenericTypes - following generic types
Returns:
self

initSut

public static void initSut(Object systemUnderTest,
                           com.googlecode.mockarro.injector.InjectionPoint injectionPoint)
Initialises Mockarro for given system under test and specifies the injection point. Its basic task is to reset the test by creating and injecting mocks into the system under test.

This method has to be invoked before every single test execution - preferably within a before method (a method annotated with @Before in JUnit 4.x or @BeforeMethod in TestNG).

Parameters:
systemUnderTest - the unit that is going to be tested.
injectionPoint - the injection point.

whenRequested

public static <T> Mockarro<T> whenRequested(Class<T> typeOfRequestedValue)
Registers behaviour for all of the methods that return an object or a primitive of a declared type.

Throws an IllegalStateException if the initSut(Object) method has not been invoked for the current system under test before invoking this method.

Type Parameters:
T - will be automatically inferred.
Parameters:
typeOfRequestedValue - The type literal i.e. class or primitive literal. For example if the requested type is of MyClass type the typeOfRequestedValue will be MyClass.class, if the requested object is of a primitive integer type use int.class, etc.
Returns:
a Mockarro object that can be used for ongoing stubbing.

thenReturn

public void thenReturn(T recordedValue)
Defines the value that will be returned when object of defined type is requested.

Parameters:
recordedValue - the vale that will be returned by the mocked object when the mock object is requested to return the value of previously defined type.
